TopicTitle: How to make surface connections stiffer?

Articles.Content: Node connections are very strong in the game. But robotic arms assembled from Infernal Robotics hinges turn out very wobbly at the root which is surface connected. It's a very unrealistic behavior. Is there any way to tackle this issue?
Upping the thing, maybe someone knows...

All I can suggest is struts. You are able to strut interiors of parts depending on where the mouse is so it remains hidden and that does a pretty good job. I can't think of anything else, sorry.

And to be more clear, interiors as in you place a strut invisibly inside a part and strut it to the adjacent component.
